message: Hi Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. I believe it's a great value for the features and benefits it provides.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you at a price of $10500. This is a competitive price that still reflects the value the product brings to the table.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $9800. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'm now offering the product to you at a price of $11000. This is a fair price that reflects the value the product brings to the table.

I understand that you're still holding firm on the price, Alice. However, I'm not willing to go above $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Can you consider a price of $10250?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $11000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'm now offering the product to you at a price of $10750. This is a fair price that still reflects the value the product brings to the table.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $10300, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're trying to make a compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to my previous offer. I'm now offering the product to you at a price of $10900. This is a fair price that still reflects the value the product brings to the table.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, Alice. However, I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go above $10000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. Can you reconsider and meet me at $10000?
